posts.post_content:
[quote name="scmavl" post=959352]Would you like $200? Of course you would!

I'm looking to buy a group of T206 beaters, the bigger the better. I do want each card to be recognizable and at least 95% intact. But if it's trimmed, creased, has writing on the back, torn, paper loss, etc, I'M INTERESTED. 

Please send me a scan or group pic of the cards. Make me your best offer. I don't want $100 worth of cards. I don't want $300 worth of cards. Give me a solid deal on a large group of T206 and I'll send you a crisp money order for $200. If you can put a HOFer or two in there, you get priority. 

You can PM or email [url]gredandforgerock@gmail.com[/url] (preferred). 

Thanks guys.[/QUOTE]

Hoping you'll share what you ended up getting...this should be interesting!  Good luck...

My T206 beaters for sale @ $200.  I'll post here, let me know if you are interested...

"9" Raw beater T206 cards....................plus........

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture99_641_1327460557.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture99_642.jpg[/IMG]

"2" HOFers (the McGinnity has been skinned, so it really doesn't count but the T206 Mordecai Brown ("Cubs") is actually respectable and it's the tougher of the "three" Brown cards to acquire.............................plus........

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture99_639.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture99_640_1327460555.jpg[/IMG]

"5" SGC 10 graded cards which are true beaters (sorry about the blurry pic).

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture99_634.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture99_638_1327460552.jpg[/IMG]

So that is "15" cards total, plus if you want to count the McGinnity, I suppose that makes it an even "16".

Lovely Day...
Man! That is alot of cards for 200 bucks!  If you guys don't end up doing the deal let me know what U want for the skinned McGinnity.
You might want to check with Marc D P, he usually has this type of group with nice $'s... I believe he posted a few days ago...
